text.value: Take from names sheet; use it to label the sample). The first three letters represent the district name, followed by three numbers representing the ID of participant
How long have you lived in this Village / street
How long have you lived in this Village / street
Highest education level of the respondent
On average how many times have you been outside your region during the past 12 months?
Please, mention the countries other than Tanzania where you have been to during the past 12 months
History of fever persisting after using antimalarials
Muscle, bone, back or joint pain
Exposure risk practices: During the past 3 months; has participant: (Keep to mentioning examples of VHF diseases to particpants for each relevant questions)
Received a tick bite &/or removed a tick &/or crushed a tick with their bare hands
Been into contact with wild animals or rodents?
Been into contact with wild birds?
Exposure risk practices: During the past 3 months; has participant: (Keep to mentioning examples of VHF diseases to particpants for each relevant questions)
Handled or butchered dead primates/been involved in drying or smoking
Come into contact with the body fluids of, or had direct contact with dead animal
Come into contact with the body fluids of, or had direct contact with dead individual
Are there some stagnant water bodies at home
Do you have piped water at home
Do you Frequently visit recreation facilities
Please select animals which are being kept
Other animals kept apart from listed ones
Do you keep animals within the house you sleep?
Please select animals which are kept within the house you sleep
Other animals which are kept within the house apart from listed ones
Awareness: Have you heard of human disease characterised by high fever & body bleeding
Awareness: Please select human diseases heard characterised by high fever & body bleeding
Other diseases heard, characterised by high fever & body bleeding
What was the source of information (TV, Radio, family, friend, school, newspaper)?
Do you know how VHF can be prevented

bind.jr:requiredMsg: Place of sample/data collection is required
How long have you lived (month) is required
How long have you lived (years) is required
avarage time spent ouside the region is required
Seffered from fever opt is required
Persisting after using antimalarials is required
Contact with wild animals is required
Contact with wild birds is required
Contact body fluids/dead animal is required
Contact body fluid/dead individual is required
Usage of mosquito net is required
Animals kept within house are required
Other Animals kept within house is/are required
Human disease heard characterised by VHF is required
Other example of VHF is/are required
How to prevent VHF is required
